page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF K.MUNNS
page.content: At 7.30 my radio alarm clock wakes me up and I tumble down the stairs to eat my breakfast;two Weetbix, a cup of tea and one piece of toast;with the rest of my family.Then I return to my bedroom and put my school uniform on. At 8.30 my father takes my brother and I to school.We both remain there until 3.45.I study the following subjects:Maths,English,Geography,Histo ry,Science,Latin,French,German & Greek I enjoy all sports and play tennis for the county.When I get home I do my prep.,have tea and then I take my dog Gemma for a walk in the local park. The rest of my evening is spent watching television or reading a book. I generally go to bed at 9.30 and listen to my radio until about 10.00. KATHRYN MUNNS.
